sentences.en: Clinical features common to the three patients initially include fever, headache, diarrhoea and myalgia developing into rash and hepatic dysfunction, followed by rapid deterioration and death.
sentences.cn: 这三位病人的共同临床症状是，最初发烧、头痛、腹泻和肌痛，接着出现皮疹和肝功能障碍，然后病情迅速恶化和死亡。

sentences.en: In Orissa state, India, 4904 cases of fever associated with myalgia and headache have been reported between 27 February - 5 March 2006.
sentences.cn: 在印度奥里萨邦，2006年2月27日至3月5日报告了4 904例与肌痛和头痛有关的发热病例。

sentences.en: Influenza is characterized by fever, myalgia, headache, pharyngitis , cough and prostration.
sentences.cn: 流感主要症状为发热 、 肌痛 、 头痛 、 咽炎 、 咳嗽及疲劳等.

sentences.en: The main symptoms are fever, chills, headache, malaise and muscle pain (myalgia).
sentences.cn: 主要症状为发热、寒战、头痛、倦怠和肌痛。

trans.tran_en: pain in a muscle or a group of muscles
